narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lompoc Valley Medical Center is a Skilled Nursing Facility provider based in Lompoc, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $10.3M in Medicaid payments across 647 claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $10.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
